description.value:
Activated as a Half Action, all Focus Power Tests, all Tests made as part of Rituals, and all Psychic Phenomena Rolls within 20m have +20, with an additional +10 per additional active spire also within 20m. If Perils of the Warp Occur, the closest spire explodes causing 1d10+5 E, Pen 5 Damage with Blast(5) and is destroyed.

Requirements

A ~1m high blue crystal with a rune-encrusted mounting. Heretical

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
